704791f-a.text:
Hanson Place, south side, east from South Portland Avenue to Fulton Street, showing the Hanson Baptist Church on the S.W. corner of South Portland Street and the B.M.T. Elevated on Fulton Street.
June 15, 1940
P.L. Sperr
704791f-a.folder: Hanson Place & Portland Avenue (South), Brooklyn, NY

704793f-a.text:
Knights of Columbus Institute, 81 Hanson Pl., Brooklyn.

This view shows w.s. of S. Portland Ave., fr. Hanson Pl. to Fulton St., Brooklyn.

Neg. no. A-1182

P.L. Sperr, photographer
Aug. 28, 1941
704793f-a.folder: Hanson Place & Portland Avenue (South), Brooklyn, NY
